LanguageData.AC_LalafellRoastRiceBowl.label: Lalafell Roast Meat Rice Bowl
LanguageData.AC_LalafellRoastRiceBowl.description: Made with the meat of the Tinimar, this roast meat rice bowl is paired with tomato sauce, offering a sweet and tangy flavor that has won the hearts of many young colonists.
LanguageData.AC_LalafellRoastRiceBowlBuff.label: Lalafell Roast Meat Rice Bowl Effect
LanguageData.AC_LalafellRoastRiceBowlBuff.description: After eating the Lalafell Roast Meat Rice Bowl, your appetite will become more vigorous.
